DOC.brief_summary: Specific aim : 1 . Evaluate feasibility intervention relate ( 1 ) girl ' participation ; ( 2 ) adherence protocol ; ( 3 ) user provider ( nurse PA Club instructor ) satisfaction . 2 . Explore participant intervention group , compare control group , show improvement primary outcome minute moderate vigorous physical activity ( MVPA ; measure accelerometer ) , also secondary outcome self-report MVPA , cardiovascular fitness , body mass index , percent body fat , waist circumference 6 month . 3 . Explore primary outcome mediate cognitive ( perceived benefit PA , perceive barrier PA , PA self-efficacy , social support , norm , model ) affective ( enjoyment PA ) variable . 4 . Explore participant intervention group , compare control group , great minute MVPA 7 month .
DOC.brief_title: Middle School Physical Activity Intervention Girls
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study test feasibility obtain preliminary evidence efficacy 6-month `` Girls Move '' intervention ( guided Health Promotion Model Social Cognitive Theory ) . The intervention involve motivational , individually tailor counsel plus after-school physical activity ( PA ) increase moderate vigorous physical activity ( MVPA ) cardiovascular ( CV ) fitness , well improve body composition cognition affective response relate MVPA among 6th-grade girl . Specifically , consist 90-minute after-school PA Club include MVPA 6 one-on-one monthly motivational , individually tailor counseling session register ( school ) nurse school day support girl 's continued MVPA . Applying motivational interviewing communication style , school nurse individually tailor counsel base upon girl 's key response glean computerized questionnaire assess cognitive affective variable relate MVPA . One middle school randomly assign receive intervention another serve attention control .
DOC.criteria: ( 1 ) 6thgrade girl ( age 1012 ) ( 7thgraders need ; include age 14 ) report meet national MVPA recommendation ; ( 2 ) available willing participate 6 mo . ; ( 3 ) able read , understand , speak English ( e.g. , school nurse check girl read grade level enrol remedial course ) . Exclusion criterion : ( 1 ) Involved school community sport organize PAs lesson , dance , martial art , gymnastics , tennis , involve MVPA require participation 3 days/wk . every season school year ; ( 2 ) health condition limit preclude safe MVPA .
